text: The 2008–09 Bill Beaumont Cup (Rugby Union County Championship) was the 109th edition of England's County Championship rugby union club competition. Lancashire won their 19th title after defeating Gloucestershire in the final. == Final == {| width="80%" |valign="top" width="50%"| {| style="font-size: 90%" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" |-
